nodes.text: The Drall Patriot Warehouse was a bunker located on the planet Corellia. It was used by the Drall Patriots during the Galactic Civil War.

The Drall Patriot Warehouse was located on the outskirts of the city of Doaba Guerfel. After the Battle of Yavin, the warehouse was inhabited by a group of Drall Patriots, an organization of Drall extremists fighting for the independence of Drall from the Corellian government.

Circa 1 ABY, a CorSec agent working for Captain Vitala Baize investigated the warehouse because the informant Lilith Laughlin mentioned possible connections between the Drall Patriots and a criminal organization known as the Chirq Council. The agent assaulted the bunker and killed several Drall Patriot tacticians. Although it was discovered that the Patriots were hatching some future terrorist activities, no evidence of connections with the Chirq Council was found.

In the meantime, the Selonian peacekeeper Dayana was also investigating the bunker. The Selonian was afraid that the Drall Patriots could be using the bunker to plan their future attack. She therefore recruited a spacer to infiltrate the warehouse and downloaded information from their data terminals in order to discover what they were planning. The spacer was successful and Dayana ensured that the information gathered would be crucial to prevent the Drall Patriots from harming innocent people.

The Drall Patriot Warehouse appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Drall Patriot Warehouse was added to the game with the update named "Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives", published on June 8, 2006.
